game.name: Mute
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Mutes" is a live-action mystery game. From a third-person perspective, you will make critical choices, engage in deductive reasoning to communicate for the protagonist, and perform quick-time reactions to survive a murder mystery.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Mutes" is a live-action mystery game. From a third-person perspective, you will make critical choices, engage in deductive reasoning to communicate for the protagonist, and perform quick-time reactions to survive a murder mystery.
